quest.name: Do It for the Vine
journal:
Maru is gazing sadly at an empty crate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the area from the designated location and defeat any manjusaka that appear.
Deliver the bundle of thick manjusaka vines to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Listen, Forename─an important part of ridin' is bein' ready to ride at all times. And that means keepin' up regular maintenance on your cart.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: It so happens that we're runnin' low on certain spare parts, and gettin' more of 'em... Well, let's just say it's best suited for fightin' types, eh? Like you!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: If you could swing by the old Hamsa Hatchery an' fetch me some manjusaka vines, I'd be much obliged.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You're gonna have to take down some small fry to get to the gnarlier chap, but his are the vines we want. A healthy handful should do!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: A gnarled manjusaka unfurls before you!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: These are perfect! Our hippos appreciate your kindness. As do I.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You see, these vines are what stand between the yoke and our precious hippos' skin─an' believe you me, you never wanna see a blistered hippo.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We always make sure to keep fresh vines in reserve, but go through 'em quicker than you might think. I hope you won't mind fetchin' some again when the time comes...
